title: P!nk - Raise Your Glass (Official Video)
description:
P!nk's official music video for 'Raise Your Glass'. Click to listen to P!nk on Spotify: http://smarturl.it/PSpot?IQid=PRYG
P!NK's new album ‘TRUSTFALL’ is out now! Listen here: https://pink.lnk.to/TRUSTFALL

As featured on Greatest Hits...So Far!!!. Click to buy the track or album via iTunes: http://smarturl.it/PGHiTunes?IQid=PRYG
Google Play: http://smarturl.it/PRYGPlay?IQid=PRYG
Amazon: http://smarturl.it/PGHAm?IQid=PRYG

More from P!nk

Try: https://youtu.be/yTCDVfMz15M

Follow P!nk

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Pink

Subscribe to P!nk on YouTube: http://smarturl.it/PSub?IQid=PRYG

More great Ultimate Hits of the Noughties videos here: http://smarturl.it/UNPlaylist?IQid=PRYG

---------

Lyrics:

Right, right, turn off the lights
We're gonna lose our minds tonight
What's the deal, yo?
I love when it's all too much
5 a.m. turn the radio up
Where's the rock 'n roll?

Party crasher, panty snatcher
Call me up if you're a gangsta
Don't be fancy, just get dancy
Why so serious?

So raise your glass if you are wrong
In all the right ways, all my underdogs
We will never be, never be anything but loud
And nitty, gritty, dirty, little freaks
Won'tyou come on and come on and
Raise your glass!
Just come on and come on and
Raise your glass!"

meta_title: P!nk - Raise Your Glass (Official Music Video)

new_description:
Celebrating Individuality with P!nk's "Raise Your Glass"

P!nk is a powerhouse performer known for her rebellious spirit and unique musical style. Her song "Raise Your Glass" is no exception, epitomizing her flair for crafting anthems that celebrate individuality and non-conformity. Released as a part of her album Greatest Hits... So Far!!!, this track has become a go-to anthem for many around the world who identify with its message of self-acceptance.

The Anthem of the Underdogs

With its high-energy beats and catchy lyrics, "Raise Your Glass" is a celebration of those who walk to the beat of their own drum. The song kicks off with a bold beginning, engaging audiences with the line "Right, right, turn off the lights; we're gonna lose our minds tonight." It promises an evening of unbridled fun and freedom, inviting everyone to embrace their inner "nitty, gritty, dirty, little freak."

The lyrics of "Raise Your Glass" challenge societal norms and encourage listeners to feel proud of themselves, regardless of what others may think. "So raise your glass if you are wrong, in all the right ways," P!nk sings, turning perceived flaws into badges of honor. It's a rallying cry for the misunderstood, urging them to stand tall and celebrate their uniqueness.

Musical Composition and Style

The song's upbeat tempo and infectious melody make it an instant favorite on dance floors and playlists alike. P!nk's strong vocal delivery, coupled with pop-rock instrumentation, creates a track that is both empowering and exhilarating. The production style showcases P!nk's capabilities as an artist who can balance complex themes with approachable music.

Drawing from pop and rock influences, the song exemplifies P!nk's fearless approach to genre blending. Whether it's the pulsating percussion or the roaring guitar riffs, every element of "Raise Your Glass" contributes to its status as a timeless hit.

Behind the Scenes of the Official Music Video

Directed with vivid imagery and a lively storyline, the official music video for "Raise Your Glass" further enhances the song's message. With scenes that depict a diverse array of characters proudly exhibiting their quirks, the video is both a visual spectacle and a narrative on inclusion. P!nk features as various personas, each representing a facet of individuality, adding her signature sense of humor and style to the visual experience.

With colorful settings and playful antics, the video underscores the notion of embracing who you are. From the party crasher to the panty snatcher, every role is a testament to the song's celebration of diversity and acceptance.

A Timeless Message for a Modern Audience

Though years have passed since its release, "Raise Your Glass" remains a beloved anthem. Its popularity can be attributed not only to its catchy tune but also to its enduring message. In an age where social acceptance often hinges on conformity, P!nk's song serves as a reminder that individual differences are not only acceptable but worthy of celebration.

With lines that encourage listeners to "just get dancy" and question "why so serious?", P!nk injects a sense of fun and liberation into her music. She invites audiences to let go of their inhibitions, embrace their flaws, and raise a metaphorical glass to their true selves.

Impact and Legacy

Beyond its commercial success, "Raise Your Glass" has an undeniable cultural impact. Its adoption by various communities as an unofficial anthem of defiance and pride highlights its broad appeal. Schools, dance clubs, and social gatherings continue to echo with its rallying chorus, bringing people together in the spirit of self-acceptance.

Ultimately, "Raise Your Glass" is not just a song. It's a movement, a statement that challenges societal expectations and champions the underdog. In true P!nk fashion, it shines a light on the beauty of imperfection and the strength found in our differences.

By combining melody, message, and visual artistry, "Raise Your Glass" stands as a testament to P!nk's artistic prowess and her commitment to crafting music that speaks to and for the people. With its electrifying beat and powerful lyrics, it continues to inspire countless fans worldwide.

So when the world tries to tell you who to be, remember P!nk's words: "Come on and raise your glass!"
